title: Must See! 2 Brms • 1 Bath Apartment ~ Great Neighborhood! Near All!
posting_body: ['ATTENTION: Please read the ENTIRE AD before contacting us.', 'This is an Owner-occupied property.', 'Showing for applicants with clean background checks ONLY.', 'The address will only be given at the time of appointment confirmation.', 'FULL background checks and income verification are required for ALL ADULTS.', 'NO EXCEPTIONS!', 'NO criminal records and NO evictions.', 'NO EXCEPTIONS!', 'Couples or 2 adults can apply together, more than 2 adults reference eachother when applying.', '900 sqft ~ 3rd floor ~ Freshly painted 2 bedrooms with an extra room, 1 bath (shower only) apartment in a quiet house and great neighborhood, on the Pawtucket/South Attleboro border near all and off I 95', '~NOT accepting relocation applications', '~NO smoking of any kind', '~Sorry NO pets allowed', '~New carpet and appliances', '~New energy-efficient hot water heater, furnace, and new energy-efficient roof', '~Eat-in-kitchen, large pantry, and walk-in closet', '~24-hour laundromats nearby', '~Off street parking for one standard size vehicle', '~Owner pays for water, sewer, and trash removal', '~Tenant pays their own electric and gas', '~Ring security cameras throughout the property', "~Steady work history and 4 recent pay-stubs (all income must be verifiable and a minimum of 2.5X's the monthly rent, i.e $3,250/month).", 'Month-to-Month Lease', "1st month's rent and 1 month security deposit required There is a $30 non-refundable online application fee"]
